issue.title: LazySourceSpec: improve 'no demand' test stability

labels.name: tested
labels.description: PR that was successfully built and tested by Jenkins

repository.name: akka-core
repository.description: A platform to build and run apps that are elastic, agile, and resilient. SDK, libraries, and hosted environments.

issue.body:
Perhaps the probe might introduce some internal buffering that doesn't
happen for a 'direct' cancellation?

Hopefully fixes #30492

body: This is probably the same as https://github.com/akka/akka/issues/28689

issue.title: Fix LazySourceSpec instability

labels.name: tested
labels.description: PR that was successfully built and tested by Jenkins

repository.name: akka-core
repository.description: A platform to build and run apps that are elastic, agile, and resilient. SDK, libraries, and hosted environments.

issue.body:
Don't make claims about whether this stage has completed.

Fixes #30492

issue.title: Remove WhiteSource plugin

labels.name: tested
labels.description: PR that was successfully built and tested by Jenkins

repository.name: akka-core
repository.description: A platform to build and run apps that are elastic, agile, and resilient. SDK, libraries, and hosted environments.

issue.body: Lightbend is switching away from WhiteSource. Remove the plugin, checks, and updates, as these are now failing builds with the WhiteSource account cancelled.
